description: Lemon and basil give green tea a zingy and herbal lift.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lemon & Basil Iced Green Tea Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lemon slices, basil, honey and green tea bags into a large pitcher. Pour over 1 litre of boiling water and stir well.
Leave to steep for 15 minutes, remove the tea bags and set aside to cool. Place in the fridge to chill and infuse for 3 hours.
